content: the free version of the sweetgrass crochet earwarmer crochet headband is for the adult size only the paid pdf version has sizes available from infant to adult there are multiple size versions in the paid version vs the free version there is a video tutorial for the adult size of the sweetgrass crochet ear warmer our blog hopecornerfarm com also has a photo tutorial available for the adult size of this crochet headband as well i use a medium weight worsted weight yarn for this headband it also calls for an i 5 5mm crochet hook this is an easy and simple crochet headband that works up quickly it is a great beginner crochet project and makes a great crochet gift
